item.description:
Welcome to the 3rd Annual Scott Kelby Worldwide Photo Walk
http://worldwidephoto...

Last year, over 32,000 people in over 900 locations around the globe walked on the same day taking photos in their cities and towns. We were absolutely blown away at how many people joined together on the same day in the name of fun and photography. This year, we want each of you to invite your friends, family, and even strangers to take part and help us make it the biggest and best one yet! (Just be wary of those strangers with shifty eyes… and candy. They’re probably up to no good).

Want to sign up for the Worcester Walk? Go here: http://worldwidephoto...

Now here’s what to expect between now and the big day…

May 24: Registration open for previous walk leaders- Worcester Photo Meetups are all Signed UP!

July 24: PHOTO WALK! Worcester is Meeting @ 8:15AM at the Worcester Public Library Parking Lot

July 31: Deadline for submitting contest photos

August 7: Deadline for local winner selections

August 14: Grand Prize, Top 10 Honorable Mentions, and People’s Choice winners announced
(All dates subject to change)

You’ll also be hearing from me right here on the Worldwide Photo Walk blog once or twice a week with helpful tips for leaders and participants, so check back from time to time! http://worldwidephoto...

And that’s it! We’re really looking forward to another great day of photography and making new friends.

I hope you'll join us for this amazing fun filled morning adventure!

Cheers,
Donna and Scott

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP

item.name: Scott Kelby World Wide Photo Walk
